Articles.Content:
I am going to begin making an awesome series on youtube called the stunt series!

I need suggestions though, I am really bad at space travel and cant get anything past minmus xD I prefer planes but can do rover/boat stunts. So yea, post below what you would like to watch with commentary or music what stunts I should do!
Take a plane. Pitch the plane 90 degrees straight up and fly it into an I-beam in such a way that the pod breaks off. Then, if it is possible, land the thing using sepratrons.
How the heck do I do that? Im a noob when it comes to the technical things, all i can do is fly pretty well

Just stack a few truss pieces just a few meters off the side of the runway. I'm sure you'll be able to pull it off with the current aerodynamic system and enough SRBs. Granted, landing it with sepratrons may not be possible.
build large hoops in vab and load it onto the launch pad. then take a plane from the runway. make the hoop smaller if you succeed.

Stunts? Like Aerial Acrobatics?

Or Jackass re-enactments?

Or mebe just crashes?
Jumping over craters on the Mun kind of stunts?

Stunts? Like Aerial Acrobatics?

Or Jackass re-enactments?

Or mebe just crashes?

I'd watch that, but skydrive sucks and isn't working at the moment.
